commands.updateHS: "UPDATE '" + ID + "' SET HighScore='" + HighScore + "' WHERE Gamesplayed='" + GamesPlayed + "'"
commands.updateURL: "UPDATE profile SET ProfilePic='" + URL + "' WHERE ID='" + ID + "'"
commands.createTable: "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS %s(GamesPlayed VARCHAR(255), HighScore VARCHAR(255))",ID
